_template_info.name: Idea Generation Tournament
_template_info.description: Tournament template for generating and evaluating new book/imprint ideas
_template_info.based_on: Nimitz Volume 9 Tournament - proven 16-32 idea generation model

hybrid.description: User provides partial ideas, AI enhances them

idea_generation.system_prompt: You are a creative publishing strategist helping to generate innovative book or imprint concepts. Focus on commercial viability, editorial innovation, and market gaps.

idea_enhancement.system_prompt: You are an expert publishing consultant helping to enhance and complete partial book or imprint concepts.

comparative_evaluation.system_prompt: You are an expert publishing analyst evaluating and comparing book or imprint concepts.
